name: kmysadventure
description:
kmysadventure/克米亚的冒险 卡牌射击游戏

操作: 鼠标点击发射元素,拖动卡牌来释放技能,当木与风 /水与火的差高于4时会造成伤害,如果没有与buff反应则会产生一个buff.卡牌可以移动到红色x上来回收元素.

提示:目前一共12 11关卡牌顺序固定怪物固定.

Card shooting game

Operation: click to shoot element and drag the card to release the skill. When the difference between wood(木) and wind(风) / water(水) and fire(火) is >= 5 , it will cause damage. move card to the red cross can recovery element.

Tip: at present, have  11 levels and cards are fixed in sequence, monsters are fixed too
